title: The most useless item league of legends
body:
The ohm wrecker, I can remember the last time I've ever seen this item be relevant in any game  and the only champion that might use this is Hecarim  and he does not  need it because you would have to sacrifice a better item like deadmanplates 

What are you thoughts on the items

replies.body:
Honestly, it's never going to be a useful item, the way they designed it was terrible, and it falls trap to "either too strong, or too weak" if it disables towers for too long, then everyone takes it and it's too strong, if it's too short, then it's too weak and terrible.

It can be used, but it's just generally your better off having a proper Armor item over this (because the result ends up being close to the same.)

The best use of this item is when you're so far ahead in gold you can basically crap on your opponent if it wasn't for the turret. Just walk up to them, use ohmwrecker, smack em in the face, walk away free.
After reading what ohmwrecker is I now plan to take it into my hybrid Sion build
I think its just not really useful with the whole tank meta it's not like 3 seconds of a tank not being hit under the tower is really going to save him from anything

they should probably rework ohmwrecker. It's stat value is too low, it's not powerful, it's hard to use, costs alot of gold and is generally moot by the time you can afford it.

It might be better if it provided an automatic effect which blocks a single hit from a tower every 45s and was more of a hybrid item, helping cement it as more of an aggressive dominance build from raptor cloak.
A suggestion of making it build out of raptor cloak and pickaxe, costing 375g to upgrade from these components, and offering 
40 armour, 35 attack damage, 150%base hp regen, the pointrunner passive, and helping to stabilise the classic bruisers a bit more for toplane, by giving them an item that better suits them as lane bullies.

If we compare maximal usage as of current, it provides 3s of tower disable, equivalent to 3 tower shots if used correctly, on a 120s cooldown. It's a pretty decent increase in power and utility, but I feel with the right fine tuning, and item like this wouldn't be gamebreaking.
